    vs_3_0
    def c5, 0.00784313772, -1, 1, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_normal v2
    dcl_color1 v3
    dcl_texcoord v4
    dcl_texcoord1 v5
    dcl_texcoord2 v6
    dcl_texcoord3 v7
    dcl_texcoord4 v8
    dcl_texcoord2 o0
    dcl_texcoord o1.xy
    dcl_texcoord6 o2
    dcl_texcoord7 o3
    dcl_position o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov r0.x, v6.x
    mov r0.y, v7.x
    mov r0.z, v8.x
    add r1.xyw, c7.xyzz, v5.xyzz
    mov r0.w, r1.x
    dp4 r0.x, r0, v0
    mov r2.w, r1.y
    mov r2.x, v6.y
    mov r2.y, v7.y
    mov r2.z, v8.y
    dp4 r0.y, r2, v0
    mov r1.x, v6.z
    mov r1.y, v7.z
    mov r1.z, v8.z
    dp4 r0.z, r1, v0
    mad r1.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r2, r0.y, c1
    mad r2, c0, r0.x, r2
    mad r0, c2, r0.z, r2
    mad r0, c3, v0.w, r0
    dp3 r2.x, r1, v6
    dp3 r2.y, r1, v7
    dp3 r2.z, r1, v8
    mad r1.xyz, v1, c5.x, c5.y
    dp3 o3.x, r1, r2
    mad r3, v2, c5.x, c5.y
    mul r4.xyz, r1.yzxw, r3.zxyw
    mad r1.xyz, r3.yzxw, r1.zxyw, -r4
    mul r1.xyz, r3.w, r1
    dp3 o3.z, r3, r2
    dp3 o3.y, r1, r2
    mov o0, v3
    mov o1.xy, v4
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c6.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c6, r0

mov o4, r0 // Relocated from line 74 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 61A3BB7C.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o4, r0 // Relocated to line 73 with shadertool.py
    mov o3.w, c5.z
